title: Jerry Rawlings
summary: Jerry John Rawlings (22 June 1947 – 12 November 2020)[1] was a Ghanaian President, a military officer and politician who led the country from 1981 to 2001 and also for a brief period in 1979. He led a military junta until 1992, and then served two terms as the democratically elected President of Ghana.[2][3][4]
